movies.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones
movies.plot: Seventeen-year-old Jesse has been hearing terrifying sounds coming from his neighbor’s apartment, but when he turns on his camera and sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that won’t rest until it’s claimed his very soul.

movies.title: Paranormal Activity 2
movies.plot: Days after welcoming a newborn baby, Dan and Kristi Rey return home one day to find their house ransacked with seemingly no explanation. Their fear forces them to put in security cameras, which begin to capture strange activity around the house.

events.title: Kristi and Daniel Rey are killed
Ali returns from a school trip and finds the bodies of Kristi and Daniel Rey

movies.title: Paranormal Activity 3
movies.plot: In 1988, an entity begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi in this prequel to the 'Paranormal Activity' series.

movies.title: Paranormal Activity
movies.plot: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie and Micah become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

movies.title: Paranormal Activity 4
movies.plot: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.
